stat.name: busy_cycles
stat.value: (stats.system.cpu0.numCycles - stats.system.cpu0.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu1.numCycles - stats.system.cpu1.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu2.numCycles - stats.system.cpu2.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu3.numCycles - stats.system.cpu3.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu4.numCycles - stats.system.cpu4.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu5.numCycles - stats.system.cpu5.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu6.numCycles - stats.system.cpu6.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu7.numCycles - stats.system.cpu7.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu8.numCycles - stats.system.cpu8.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu9.numCycles - stats.system.cpu9.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu10.numCycles - stats.system.cpu10.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu11.numCycles - stats.system.cpu11.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu12.numCycles - stats.system.cpu12.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu13.numCycles - stats.system.cpu13.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu14.numCycles - stats.system.cpu14.idleCycles) + (stats.system.cpu15.numCycles - stats.system.cpu15.idleCycles)

stat.name: memory_accesses
stat.value: (stats.system.mem_ctrls0.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls1.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls2.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls3.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls4.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls5.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls6.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls7.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls8.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls9.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls10.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls11.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls11.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls12.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls13.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls14.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls15.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls0.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls1.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls2.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls3.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls4.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls5.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls6.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls7.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls8.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls9.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls10.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls11.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls11.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls12.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls13.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls14.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls15.writeReqs)

stat.name: memory_reads
stat.value: (stats.system.mem_ctrls0.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls1.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls2.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls3.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls4.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls5.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls6.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls7.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls8.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls9.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls10.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls11.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls11.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls12.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls13.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls14.readReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls15.readReqs)

stat.name: memory_writes
stat.value: (stats.system.mem_ctrls0.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls1.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls2.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls3.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls4.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls5.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls6.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls7.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls8.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls9.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls10.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls11.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls11.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls12.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls13.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls14.writeReqs + stats.system.mem_ctrls15.writeReqs)
